name: The Scourge of the Scorn Lords - Solo Rules
name_original: The Scourge of the Scorn Lords - Solo Rules
description:
Created by Alex T. and Ahimsa K, based on Scourge of the Scorn Lords by Wind L and Ahimsa K for Old School Essentials by Gavin N.

These solo rules will allow you to experience the wonder and the terror of the Scorn Lands even when your friends bail on you for game day.
